banner_home.title: Exquisite dining since 1989
banner_home.desc: Experience our seasonal menu in beautiful country surroundings. Eat the freshest produce from the comfort of our farmhouse.

image_text.title: Enjoyable place for all the family
image_text.desc: Our relaxed surroundings make dining with us a great experience for everyone. We can even arrange a tour of the farm before your meal.

text_image.title: The most locally sourced food
text_image.desc: All our ingredients come directly from our farm or local fishery. So you can be sure that you’re eating the freshest, most sustainable food.

menu_highlights.title: A few highlights from our menu
menu_highlights.desc: We cater for all dietary requirements, but here’s a glimpse at some of our diner’s favourites. Our menu is revamped every season.

menu_list.title: Seared Salmon Fillet
menu_list.desc: Our locally sourced salmon served with a refreshing buckwheat summer salad.

menu_list.title: Rosemary Filet Mignon
menu_list.desc: Our prime beef served to your taste with a delicious choice of seasonal sides.

menu_list.title: Summer Fruit Chocolate Mousse
menu_list.desc: Creamy mousse combined with summer fruits and dark chocolate shavings.

slider.title: Family Gathering
slider.desc: We love catering for entire families. So please bring everyone along for a special meal with your loved ones. We’ll provide a memorable experience for all.

slider.title: Special Events
slider.desc: Whether it’s a romantic dinner or special date you’re celebrating with others we’ll look after you. We’ll be sure to mark your special date with an unforgettable meal.

slider.title: Social Events
slider.desc: Are you looking to have a larger social event? No problem! We’re more than happy to cater for big parties. We’ll work with you to make your event a hit with everyone.

banner_page.title: Reservations
banner_page.desc: We can’t wait to host you. If you have any special requirements please feel free to call on the phone number below. We’ll be happy to accommodate you.
